meanings.definition: The number equivalent to the product of four and ten.
meanings.sent1: I counted up to forty candies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: There are forty students in our class.
meanings.sent3: I tried to eat forty cookies, but I couldn't finish them all.
meanings.sent4: The room was so quiet, you could hear a pin drop forty times over.
meanings.sent5: The sunflower stood tall at forty inches high.

meanings.definition: A group or set of forty individuals or things.
meanings.sent1: The choir consisted of forty singers.
meanings.sent2: There were forty apples in the basket.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a superhero leading a team of forty ducks.
meanings.sent4: The forest was a sea of green with forty shades of leaves.
meanings.sent5: The library had exactly forty books on dinosaurs.

meanings.sent1: She paid for the groceries with a forty.
meanings.sent2: He found a forty in his old jacket pocket.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted exact change, so I needed a forty.
meanings.sent4: The street performer's hat was filled with twenties, tens, and a single forty.
meanings.sent5: The antique shop displayed an old framed forty on the wall.
